description: A source finding program designed to find and characterise compact continuum radio sources

parameters.info: Additional table outputs, format inferred from extension (database: .db, votable: .vot, and ascii: .csv)
parameters.name: outfile

parameters.info: If the input data is a cube, then this slice will determine the array index of the image which will be processed by aegean
parameters.name: slice

parameters.info: A .fits file that represents the local psf
parameters.name: psf

parameters.info: A .fits file that represents the image noise
parameters.name: noise

parameters.info: Use this regions file to restrict source finding in this image. Use MIMAS region (.mim) files.
parameters.name: region

parameters.info: Assume a single image noise of rms
parameters.name: forcerms

parameters.info: If more than *maxsummits* summits are detected in an island, no fitting is done, only estimation. [default: no limit]
parameters.name: maxsummits

parameters.info: The clipping value (in sigmas) for seeding islands
parameters.name: seedclip

parameters.info: The clipping value (in sigmas) for growing islands
parameters.name: floodclip
